title: Stage S09
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: I love you.
She gave me her book.
This book is mine.
He told us his story.
We helped them yesterday.
Your car is faster than mine.
They invited us to their party.
The bag is hers.
Can you help me with my homework?

sentences.kr: 그것은 그들 것이지, 우리 것이 아닙니다.
sentences.en: It is theirs, not ours.
I love you.
She gave me her book.
This book is mine.
He told us his story.
We helped them yesterday.
Your car is faster than mine.
They invited us to their party.
The bag is hers.
Can you help me with my homework?

sentences.kr: 그것은 그들 것이지, 우리 것이 아닙니다.
sentences.en: It is theirs, not ours.

sentences.kr: 비가 오면 집에 있을 거예요. (실제 가능한 조건)
sentences.en: If it rains, I will stay home.

sentences.kr: 백만 달러가 있다면 세계여행을 할 텐데요. (비현실적 가정)
sentences.en: If I had a million dollars, I would travel the world.
If you study hard, you will pass the exam.
If I were you, I would apologize.

sentences.kr: 그녀가 일찍 오면 회의를 시작할 수 있어요. (가능한 상황)
sentences.en: If she comes early, we can start the meeting.

sentences.kr: 복권에 당첨된다면 직장을 그만둘 텐데요. (꿈같은 이야기)
sentences.en: If I won the lottery, I would quit my job.
If you don't hurry, you will be late.

sentences.kr: 날 수 있다면 모든 나라를 방문할 텐데요. (불가능한 가정)
sentences.en: If I could fly, I would visit every country.
If the weather is nice, let's go for a walk.

sentences.kr: 시간이 더 있다면 새로운 언어를 배울 텐데요. (시간 부족 가정)
sentences.en: If I had more time, I would learn a new language.

sentences.kr: 비가 오면 집에 있을 거예요. (실제 가능한 조건)
sentences.en: If it rains, I will stay home.
